abstract: Pete Wells reviews restaurant Lowlife on Manhattan's Lower East Side.

headline.print_headline: The Trouble With Playing It Cool
headline.main: Lowlife Plays It Cool on the Lower East Side

snippet: At this new restaurant from a former Blanca chef, sensible minimalism clashes with a grand manner.
lead_paragraph: At this new restaurant from a former Blanca chef, sensible minimalism clashes with a grand manner.
